alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Ottawa; Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 10:23PM CDT until August 13 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CRAIG...NORTHEASTERN ROGERS...NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND SOUTHERN OTTAWA COUNTIES... At 1022 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Chelsea to 2 miles west of Afton to near Seneca, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Grove... Chelsea... Fairland... Afton... Bernice... Wyandotte... White Oak... Bernice State Park... Narcissa... Twin Bridges State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 277 and 304. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
